familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president of LFB Acquisition LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.

Former president/director/chairman of LFB Acquisition Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
